Portfolio data science Sam de Kruif 2025-05-25 1 Portfolio introduction This data science portfolio is developed during my minor in Data science. This portfolio presents a selection of projects and exercises that demonstrate the skills and techniques I have acquired throughout the program. The work included here reflects a range of core data science competencies, such as: Data cleaning and preprocessing Exploratory data analysis Data visualization Statistical modeling Reproducible reporting using R Markdown Critical evaluation of scientific reproducibility Each section includes either executable R code, interpreted outputs, or written analysis to provide clear insights into my approach and understanding. Where applicable, I also reflect on the scientific context and practical relevance of the data analyses.
